description:
It doesn't have to be lonely at the top!
Become a leader who is respected AND well liked!

Modern leadership needs to change: You don't need to be hated to be effective. Today we can only lead successfully if we make the people in our care our prime focus and understand how they operate.
Only by making your own team successful and by creating a positive work environment, will you be able to reach your goals.

This course is designed to enable you to use the basic techniques of an empathic leader in a little under an hour by:

- teaching 5 easy steps towards applying an empathic leadership style

- creating an awareness of the dangers of bad leadership

- offering an overview of the positive effects of empathic leadership

- helping you to overcome challenges that you might face along the way

Take this course to learn how to be an empathic and effective leader that people want to follow!
title: Successful Leadership: A workshop for the modern leader
